This retarded kid also admitted as he provoked me in emails ans said it was his easiest scam of his life and he spent my 15$ very well. My evidences to PayPal, hopefully it is valid here:  ","evidence":"Conversation on paypal: 04/11/2017 00:05 GMT+02:00 - Buyer: Seller agreeing to the deal:https://www.upload.ee/image/7626042/3333.png 03/11/2017 23:55 GMT+02:00 - Buyer: Seller has scammed me through Steam.I agreed to pay up front 15$, then I get the virtual skin, then I pay the rest.We both agreed. He then said he can't do it, so he will send me the money back.I was then blocked and removed from his friend list, with no refund from his side. Evidence:[img]https://www.upload.ee/image/7626013/2221111.png[/img] [img]https://www.upload.ee/image/7626010/5555.png[/img] [img]https://www.upload.ee/image/7626002/4441.png[/img] [img]https://www.upload.ee/image/7626003/222.png[/img] You have full evidences that he sent the email, I sent to the said email, he said he will pay back because he can't mentally do it, even though I paid upfront 1/3 of the skin price (what we agreed), he just scammed me and took off! End of the paypal convo.. Seller has told PayPal he "changed his mind", added me and sent me the knife and photoshoped a screenshot that I got the knife. Down below I will show everything in a video so I can't "fake/photoshop it". The seller has then provoked me in emails and in Steam. He messaged me in email the following: https://gyazo.com/b359450667fc313f97890859ec83e244 Not only that he lied that I scammed him and faked a screenshot in PhotoShop, he also admitted that it was the easiest scam of his life and he's spending the money well.. Seller faking a screenshot that he changed his mind and he gave me his knife and then saying that I "scammed" him: https://i.imgur.com/DBslh6O.jpg. I mean let's think rationally why would he say send the rest of the money in the trade offer instead of saying me in steam chat? its too risky and stupid. The only reason is - HE FAKED THE SCREENSHOT. Evidences below: Proof that I never recevied any knife from the seller, look at the latest trades date.. https://gyazo.com/550b868afd800e7f7f826d24f0645634 Proof the seller has his knife in his inventory as of today (14/11/2017) and more skins using my money.. https://gyazo.com/cc073f25ffe00b61b3f76f952d13ff94 Proof of me being blocked by the seller, and that I didn't block him: https://gyazo.com/3d29a75627c3c71446a3a4feda3849e9 Proof of the seller provoking me again: https://gyazo.com/aae9c06cfa2838e59be5c5249ae39252 Is that enough? https://files.f-o-g.eu/gg5364g98bb212beeaag1fa91bfc04gd https://files.f-o-g.eu/4g83bbgbbd783acg9478fb1ffb9cdd86 ","views":789,"protected":0,"locked":1,"state_id":8,"assignee_id":null,"creator_id":572,"modificator_id":572,"created_at":"14.11.2017 11:59:26","updated_at":"2017-11-17 02:11:38","state":"Rejected","assignee":"
